TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypeDescriptor extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供有关组件特征的信息，如组件的特性、属性和事件。

span.span: Provides information about the characteristics for a component, such as its attributes, properties, and events.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 提供了两种方法来访问类型的元数据： 命名空间中提供的反射 API 和 类。The .NET Framework provides two ways to access metadata on a type: the reflection API provided in the namespace, and the class. 反射是适用于所有类型的常规机制，因为它的基础是在根 类的 方法中建立的。Reflection is a general mechanism available to all types because its foundation is established in the method of the root class. 它为类型返回的信息不是可扩展的，因为它不能在编译目标类型之后修改。The information it returns for a type is not extensible, in that it cannot be modified after compilation of the target type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[反射](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md)中的主题。For more information, see the topics in [Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md). 与此相反， 是一种可扩展的组件检查机制：实现 接口的类。In contrast, is an extensible inspection mechanism for components: those classes that implement the interface. 不同于反射，它不检查方法。Unlike reflection, it does not inspect for methods. 可以通过目标组件的 提供的多个服务对 进行动态扩展。 can be dynamically extended by several services available through the target component's . 下表显示了这些服务。The following table shows these services. |Service nameService name|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||启用另一个类（如 ）来向组件提供额外的属性。Enables another class, such as , to provide extra properties to a component.| ||允许其他对象修改组件公开的标准元数据。Enables another object to modify the standard metadata that is exposed by a component.| ||使类能够完全并动态地指定其自己的元数据，从而替换 的标准检查机制。Enables a class to completely and dynamically specify its own metadata, replacing the standard inspection mechanism of .| 提供的扩展性使组件的设计时表示形式不同于它的实际运行时表示形式，这使得 对于构建设计时基础结构很有用。The extensibility provided by allows the design-time representation of a component to differ from its actual run-time representation, which makes useful for building design-time infrastructure. 中的所有方法都 `static`。All the methods in are `static`. 不能创建此类的实例，也不能继承此类。You cannot create an instance of this class, and this class cannot be inherited. 您可以通过两种不同的方式来设置属性和事件值：在组件类中指定它们或在设计时更改它们。You can set property and event values two different ways: specify them in the component class or change them at design time. 由于可以通过两种方式设置这些值，因此 的重载方法采用两种不同类型的参数：类类型或对象实例。Because you can set these values two ways, the overloaded methods of take two different types of parameters: a class type or an object instance. 如果要访问 信息并且具有对象的实例，请使用调用组件的方法。When you want to access information and you have an instance of the object, use the method that calls for a component. 仅当没有对象的实例时，才使用调用类类型的方法。Use the method that calls for the class type only when you do not have an instance of the object. 属性和事件通过 高速缓存。Properties and events are cached by for speed. 通常，它们在对象的生存期内保持不变。Typically, they are constant for the lifetime of an object. 但是，扩展程序提供程序和设计器可以更改对象的属性集。However, extender providers and designers can change the set of properties on an object. 如果是这种情况，则必须调用 方法来更新缓存。If this is the case, then the method must be called to update the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可向组件的指定实例添加类级别属性。The method adds class-level attributes to the specified instance of a component. 由于这是使用 Visual Studio Windows 窗体设计器和属性窗口的应用程序的常见要求，因此此方法通过创建将提供的属性与已存在于类中。Because this is a common requirement of applications using the Visual Studio Windows Forms Designer and Properties window, this method provides a shortcut by creating a type description provider that merges the provided attributes with the attributes that already exist on the class. 返回值是用于添加特性的类型说明提供程序。The return value is the type description provider that was used to add the attributes. 以后不再需要已添加的属性时，可以将此提供程序传递到 方法。This provider can later be passed to the method when the added attributes are no longer needed.

span.span: Adds an editor table for the given editor base type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为给定的编辑器基类型添加编辑器表。The method adds an editor table for the given editor base type. 通常，在组件上将编辑器指定为元数据。Typically, editors are specified as metadata on a component. 但是，如果在组件上找不到请求的编辑器基类型的元数据，则关联的 将在编辑器表中搜索编辑器类型（如果可以找到）。However, if no metadata for a requested editor base type can be found on the component, the associated will search an editor table for the editor type, if one can be found. 将编辑器表添加到类型描述符后，不能将其移除并由类型描述符拥有。Once an editor table has been added to a type descriptor, it cannot be removed and is owned by the type descriptor. 类型说明符可以自由地对此表进行修改。The type descriptor may freely make modifications to this table. 编辑器表的格式将数据类型用作键，并使用编辑器作为值。The format for an editor table uses data types as keys and editors as values. 表中某项的值部分表示一个编辑器实例。The value portion of an entry in the table represents an editor instance. 它可以有三个值中的一个。It can have one of three values. 如果它包含字符串，则类型描述符将假定这是类型的完全限定名称，然后加载对象的类型。If it contains a string, the type descriptor will assume this is a fully qualified name of a type, and then load the type for the object. 如果它包含类型，则将创建此类型的实例以获取编辑器。If it contains a type, an instance of this type will be created to obtain an editor. 最后，值部分可能包含实际的编辑器实例。Finally, the value portion may contain an actual editor instance. 如果类型描述符将编辑器解析为实例，则会将该实例存储回表中供将来使用。If the type descriptor resolves an editor to an instance, it will store the instance back into the table for future use.

span.span: Adds a type description provider for a single instance of a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加一个类型说明提供程序，该提供程序为组件的单个实例提供类型信息。The method adds a type description provider that supplies type information for a single instance of a component. 如果通过此方法添加提供程序，则将不会调用该提供程序的 方法，因为该实例已存在。If a provider is added by this method, the provider's method will not be called because the instance already exists. 此方法不保留对组件的硬引用，因此不会阻止组件完成。This method does not maintain a hard reference to the component, so it does not prevent the component from finalizing. 可以为同一类型或对象添加多个类型说明提供程序。It is possible to add multiple type description providers for the same type or object. 如果发生这种情况，则第一个提供类型信息的类型说明提供程序将独占使用。If this occurs, the first type description provider encountered that provides type information will be used exclusively. 由于类型信息提供程序存储在堆栈中，最后添加的提供程序将是查询的第一个提供程序。Since type information providers are stored in a stack, the last provider added will be the first one queried. 此行为允许使用 和 方法根据特定方案的要求，推送和弹出类型说明提供程序。This behavior enables the and methods to be used to push and pop type description providers as required for particular scenarios. 如果成功，则此方法将对 `instance` 参数调用 方法。If successful, this method calls the method on the `instance` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 此方法的两个版本将生成具有不同范围的结果。The two versions of this method produce results with different scopes. 采用 参数的 方法仅影响指定的组件的单个实例。The method that takes an parameter affects only that single instance of the component specified. 相反，另一个重载采用 参数，它会影响该类型描述的组件的所有实例。In contrast, the other overload, which takes a parameter, affects all instances of the component described by that type. 如果需要从部分受信任的代码调用，请使用 方法。Use the method if you need to call from partially trusted code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加一个类型说明提供程序，该提供程序为指定的类、派生类和这些类型的所有实例提供类型信息。The method adds a type description provider that supplies type information for the specified class, derived classes, and all instances of these types. > [!NOTE] > `type` 参数可以是任何类型，包括接口。The `type` parameter can be any type, including an interface. 例如，若要为所有组件提供自定义类型和实例信息，需指定 `typeof(IComponent)`。For example, to provide custom type and instance information for all components, you would specify `typeof(IComponent)`. 传递 `typeof(object)` 将调用提供程序，以便为所有类型提供类型信息。Passing `typeof(object)` will call the provider to supply type information for all types. 此方法不保留对任何对象的硬引用，因此不会阻止对象完成。This method does not maintain a hard reference to any object, so it does not prevent objects from finalizing. 可以为同一类型或对象添加多个类型说明提供程序。It is possible to add multiple type description providers for the same type or object. 如果发生这种情况，则第一个提供类型信息的类型说明提供程序将独占使用。If this occurs, the first type description provider encountered that provides type information will be used exclusively. 由于类型信息提供程序存储在堆栈中，最后添加的提供程序将是查询的第一个提供程序。Because type information providers are stored in a stack, the last provider added will be the first one queried. 此行为允许使用 和 方法根据特定方案的要求，推送和弹出类型说明提供程序。This behavior enables the and methods to be used to push and pop type description providers as required for particular scenarios. 如果成功，则此方法将对 `type` 参数调用 方法。If successful, this method calls the method on the `type` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 此方法的两个版本将生成具有不同范围的结果。The two versions of this method produce results with different scopes. 采用 参数的 方法仅影响指定的组件的单个实例。The method that takes an parameter affects only that single instance of the component specified. 相反，另一个重载采用 参数，它会影响该类型描述的组件的所有实例。In contrast, the other overload, which takes a parameter, affects all instances of the component described by that type. 如果需要从部分受信任的代码调用，请使用 方法。Use the method if you need to call from partially trusted code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建主对象和辅助对象之间的关联。The method creates an association between a primary and a secondary object. 创建关联后，设计器或其他筛选机制可以将路由到任一对象的属性添加到主对象的属性集中。Once an association is created, a designer or other filtering mechanism can add properties that route to either object into the primary object's property set. 当对主对象进行属性调用时，将调用 方法来解析与类型参数相关的实际对象实例。When a property invocation is made against the primary object, the method will be called to resolve the actual object instance that is related to its type parameter. 用于维护主对象和辅助对象之间的关联;因此，此方法不会阻止任何对象被垃圾回收终止和回收。A is used to maintain the association between the primary and secondary object; therefore, this method does not prevent either object from being finalized and reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的属性可以通过扩展程序提供程序（）、筛选器服务（）和特性筛选器的原始组件源列表进行动态修改。The attributes returned by the method may be dynamically modified from the original component's source listing by extender providers (), filter services (), and attribute filters. 定义 设置为 `true`的自定义属性时，必须重写 属性，使其唯一。When you define a custom attribute with set to `true`, you must override the property to make it unique. 如果属性的所有实例都是唯一的，请重写 以返回属性的对象标识。If all instances of your attribute are unique, override to return the object identity of your attribute. 如果仅有一些属性实例是唯一的，则从 返回一个值，该值将在这些情况下返回相等性。If only some instances of your attribute are unique, return a value from that would return equality in those cases. 例如，某些属性具有充当唯一键的构造函数参数。For example, some attributes have a constructor parameter that acts as a unique key. 对于这些特性，从 属性返回构造函数参数的值。For these attributes, return the value of the constructor parameter from the property. > [!NOTE] > 的默认实现将返回类型标识，而不考虑 属性的值。The default implementation of returns the type identity regardless of the value of the property. 为了从 返回 属性的多个实例，你的属性必须重写 属性。In order to return multiple instances of an attribute from the , your attribute must override the property. ## Examples 有关此方法的示例，请参阅 方法。For an example of this method, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `component` 的属性可能不同于类的属性，这是因为当 `component` 的位置时，站点可以添加或删除属性。The properties for a `component` can differ from the properties of a class, because the site can add or remove properties if the `component` is sited. `attributes` 参数数组用于筛选数组。The `attributes` parameter array is used to filter the array. 筛选由以下规则定义：Filtering is defined by the following rules: - 如果属性没有相同类的 ，则返回的数组中将不包含该属性。If a property does not have an of the same class, the property is not included in the returned array. - 如果该特性是 类的实例，则该属性必须是完全匹配项，否则它不会包含在返回的数组中。If the attribute is an instance of the class, the property must be an exact match or it is not included in the returned array. - 如果指定了 实例并且它是默认属性，则即使属性中没有 的实例，也会将其包含在返回的数组中。If an instance is specified and it is the default property, it is included in the returned array even if there is no instance of the in the property. - 如果 `attributes` 有一个默认属性，则当属性未应用属性时， 方法与该方法匹配。If `attributes` has a default attribute, the method matches the case when the property does not have the attribute applied. 如果 `component` 参数 `null`，则返回一个空集合。If the `component` parameter is `null`, an empty collection is returned. 返回的集合的顺序并不保证在两次调用之间是相同的，因此在使用之前始终对其进行排序。The order of the returned collection is not guaranteed to be identical between calls, so always order it before use.

span.span: Clears the properties and events for the specified component from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和事件通过 高速缓存。Properties and events are cached by for speed. 通常，它们在对象的生存期内保持不变。Typically, they are constant for the lifetime of an object. 但是，扩展程序提供程序和设计器可以更改对象的属性集。However, extender providers and designers can change the set of properties on an object. 如果是这样，则应调用此方法以清除对象的属性和事件说明符。If they do, they should call this method to clear the property and event descriptors of the object. 此方法仅在设计时使用。This method is used only at design time. 它不会在运行时使用。It is not used during run time. 当组件的属性或事件发生更改时，此方法还会引发 事件。This method also raises a event when the properties or events of a component change. 仅当之前调用了缓存信息的 或 方法时，才会引发此事件。This event is only raised if there was a prior call to the or method that cached the information. ## Examples 有关使用此方法的示例，请参见 类。For an example of using this method, see the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和事件通过 高速缓存。Properties and events are cached by for speed. 通常，它们在对象的生存期内保持不变。Typically, they are constant for the lifetime of an object. 但是，扩展程序提供程序和设计器可以更改对象的属性集。However, extender providers and designers can change the set of properties on an object. 如果用户这样做，则可以调用此方法来清除对象的属性和事件说明符。If they do, they can call this method to clear the property and event descriptors of the object. 此方法仅在设计时使用。This method is used only at design time. 它不会在运行时使用。It is not used during run time. 在调用 方法以清除缓存之前，需要先调用特定程序集的 方法以缓存该信息。Before you make a call to the method to clear the cache, you need to call the method for the specific assembly to cache the information first. 此方法还会引发 事件，以通知在组件的属性集更改时希望收到通知的所有类。This method also raises a event to notify all classes that want to be notified when the property set of a component changes.
